Sentencas: The high preparation cost and poor density of spinel coatings for stainless steel interconnect have always been puzzling conundrums for the solid oxide fuel cell stack developers.
Titulo: Low-cost, high-density Mn-Co spinel coatings for stainless steel interconnect via efficient microwave heating

Sentencas: Herein, the microwave heating technology for fabricating Mn-Co spinel coating is developed to address these issues.
Titulo: Low-cost, high-density Mn-Co spinel coatings for stainless steel interconnect via efficient microwave heating

Sentencas: We designed a device spontaneously providing reducing atmospheres and realized the low-cost, high-efficiency reduction of Mn-Co spinel via microwave heating.
Titulo: Low-cost, high-density Mn-Co spinel coatings for stainless steel interconnect via efficient microwave heating

Sentencas: Dense coatings (MnO + Co) are formed on the steel surface at -1100 degrees C.
Titulo: Low-cost, high-density Mn-Co spinel coatings for stainless steel interconnect via efficient microwave heating

Sentencas: The excellent density is related to the melting of Co particles induced by microwave selective heating.
Titulo: Low-cost, high-density Mn-Co spinel coatings for stainless steel interconnect via efficient microwave heating

Sentencas: At initial, microwave heating is dominated by dipolar polarization, interfacial polarization, and natural resonance.
Titulo: Low-cost, high-density Mn-Co spinel coatings for stainless steel interconnect via efficient microwave heating

Sentencas: After forming metallic Co, conductive loss and the lens effect further accelerate the reduction process.
Titulo: Low-cost, high-density Mn-Co spinel coatings for stainless steel interconnect via efficient microwave heating

Sentencas: High-quality spinel coatings are formed during the subsequent oxidation at 800 degrees C, exhibiting an extremely low area-specific resistance increase rate.
Titulo: Low-cost, high-density Mn-Co spinel coatings for stainless steel interconnect via efficient microwave heating
